description: Lists existing rules. In Amazon DataZone, a rule is a formal agreement that enforces specific requirements across user workflows (e.g., publishing assets to the catalog, requesting subscriptions, creating projects) within the Amazon DataZone data portal. These rules help maintain consistency, ensure compliance, and uphold governance standards in data management processes. For instance, a metadata enforcement rule can specify the required information for creating a subscription request or publishing a data asset to the catalog, ensuring alignment with organizational standards.

parameters.name: assetTypes
parameters.description: The asset types of the rule. (string) ---

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain in which the rules are to be listed.

parameters.name: projectIds
parameters.description: The IDs of projects in which rules are to be listed. (string) ---

parameters.name: targetIdentifier
parameters.description: The target ID of the rule.

parameters.name: targetType
parameters.description: The target type of the rule.

nested_items.name: items
nested_items.description: The results of the ListRules action.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action of the rule.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the rule.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedBy
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the rule was last updated.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the rule.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of the rule.

nested_items.name: ruleType
nested_items.description: The type of the rule.

nested_items.name: assetType
nested_items.description: The asset type included in the rule scope.

nested_items.name: selectionMode
nested_items.description: The selection mode for the rule.

nested_items.name: specificAssetTypes
nested_items.description: The specific asset types that are included in the rule.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: dataProduct
nested_items.description: The data product included in the rule scope.

nested_items.name: selectionMode
nested_items.description: The selection mode of the rule.

nested_items.name: specificProjects
nested_items.description: The specific projects in which the rule is created.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: domainUnitTarget
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: domainUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to apply a rule to the child domain units.

nested_items.name: targetType
nested_items.description: The target type of the rule.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the rule was last updated.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: When the number of rules is greater than the default value for the MaxResults parameter, or if you explicitly specify a value for MaxResults that is less than the number of rules, the response includes a pagination token named NextToken. You can specify this NextToken value in a subsequent call to ListRules to list the next set of rules.
